General.Name: Harbin Medisan Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: Harbin Medisan Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of pharmaceutical product and medical devices in China. The company offers various drugs for nervous system, cardiovascular system, musculoskeletal system, systemic anti-infective, basic infusions, nutritional infusion, anti-tumor and immunomodulators, digestive tract, metabolism, etc. It also produces and sells cosmetics. Harbin Medisan Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Harbin, China.

3.Name: Mr. Qing Fu  Zhao
3.Title: Sec. of Board of Directors, Deputy GM & Director
